      • HTTPGETTransferredExecuteValidation

        public void HTTPGETTransferredExecuteValidation()
                                         throws IOException,
                                                URISyntaxException
        A.4.4.1 HTTP protocol GET usage
        Throws:
        IOException
        URISyntaxException - Description: 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check KVP parameters is valid or not (Required parameters include: Service, Request, Version and Identifier. Optional parameters include: Language, DataInputs, ResponseDocument, RawOutputData, StoreExecuteResponse, Lineage, Status) 3. Check KVP syntax follow 10.2.2.1 and 10.2.2.2 4. Check response code from GET request is 200 or not

      • HTTPPOSTTransferredExecuteValidation

        public void HTTPPOSTTransferredExecuteValidation()
                                          throws IOException
        A.4.4.2 HTTP protocol POST usage
        Throws:
        IOException - Description: 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check XML content is valid or not follow 10.2.3 3. Check response code from POST request is 200 or not

      • RawDataOutputExecuteValidation

        public void RawDataOutputExecuteValidation()
                                    throws IOException
        A.4.4.3 Raw Data Output
        Throws:
        IOException - Description: 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check XML content is valid or not follow 10.2.3 3. Check response code from POST request is 200 or not 4. Check response text from POST request is valid or not (How to check for all types of output?)

      • ResponseDocumentExecuteValidation

        public void ResponseDocumentExecuteValidation()
                                       throws IOException,

        A.4.4.4 Response Document
        Throws:
        IOException
        URISyntaxException - 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check XML content is valid or not follow 10.2.3 3. Check response code from POST request is 200 or not 4. Check response text from POST request is valid or not follow 10.3.2

      • UpdatingResponseDocumentExecuteValidation

        public void UpdatingResponseDocumentExecuteValidation()
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      URISyntaxException
        A.4.4.5 Updating Response Document
        Throws:
        IOException
        URISyntaxException - 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check XML content is valid or not follow 10.2.3 3. Check response code from POST request is 200 or not 4. Check response text from POST request is valid or not follow 10.3.2 (Try with LiteralData, BoundingBoxData and ComplexData. How to custom it dynamic?) 5. Check StoreResponseDocument attribute is true or false (Need to be true) 6. Check response text from GET request for statusLocation is valid or not follow 10.3.2

      • LanguageSelectionExecuteValidation

        public void LanguageSelectionExecuteValidation()
                                        throws IOException,
                                               URISyntaxException
        A.4.4.6 Language Selection
        Throws:
        IOException
        URISyntaxException - Description: 1. Check server offline or not 2. Check KVP parameters is valid or not (Required parameters include: Service, Request, Version and Identifier. Optional parameters include: Language, DataInputs, ResponseDocument, RawOutputData, StoreExecuteResponse, Lineage, Status) 3. Check KVP syntax follow 10.2.2.1 and 10.2.2.2 4. Check response code from GET request is 200 or not 5. Check response text from GET request is valid or not follow 10.3.2 (If language is not supported or error, return Exception; If supported, return ResponseDocument)

      • CheckXPath2

        public String CheckXPath2(String xpath,
                          Document testSubject)
        Check XPath2.0
        Parameters:
        xpath - String denoting an xpath syntax
        Returns:
        XdmValue converted to string

      • evaluateXPath2

        public net.sf.saxon.s9api.XdmValue evaluateXPath2(Source xmlSource,
                                                  String expr,
                                                  Map<String,String> nsBindings)
                                           throws net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException
        Evaluates an XPath 2.0 expression using the Saxon s9api interfaces.
        Parameters:
        xmlSource - The XML Source.
        expr - The XPath expression to be evaluated.
        nsBindings - A collection of namespace bindings required to evaluate the XPath expression, where each entry maps a namespace URI (key) to a prefix (value); this may be null if not needed.
        Returns:
        An XdmValue object representing a value in the XDM data model; this is a sequence of zero or more items, where each item is either an atomic value or a node.
        Throws:
        net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException - If an error occurs while evaluating the expression; this always wraps some other underlying exception.
